DD.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: the written abbreviation of direct debit
DD.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: (Doctor of Divinity) an advanced university degree in theology (=religious studies)
DD.translation[0].definitions[2].definit: (darling daughter) used on the Internet to refer to your daughter. You refer to your eldest daughter as DD1, your second daughter as DD2 etc
DD.translation[0].definitions[2].example: DD1 came home from school in tears today.
